Reviews.Title: Just as advertised
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: This product arrived promptly.  It is just as advertised, sturdy plastic, two holes for nails/screws/wire attachments and crisp/clear lettering.  The test of course will be how long it lasts once exposed to the elements.  Honestly, I think the price is too high, but I could not find what I wanted anywhere else so I am satisfied.
